item.title: Patient Concierge Service
item.description: Benefits No wait time. After patient check in and verification of insurance the patient is immediately placed in the doctorâ€™s examination room and evaluated as soon as possible. Pre-appointment Paperwork. Option to complete medical history questionnaire and intake forms online prior to appointment. Private area for in-office paperwork. Sound proof area isolated from regular waiting room available for the patient to complete online medical history and sign patient intake forms (if not completed online).
